source: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_SEQ_00<tab>Narujj Boh is troubled by reports of frenzied nighttime rituals.
target: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_SEQ_00<tab>Im Ring der Asche möchte Narujj Boh dich damit beauftragen, den feindlichen Amalj'aa besondere Waffen zu entwenden.

source: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_SEQ_01<tab>Narujj Boh shares with you news of a new form of ritual taking place at the Zanr'ak altar. He asks that you search the area of the Zanr'ak encampment and altar for weapon caches, and seize the armaments scouts claim were enchanted with unholy flames.
target: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_SEQ_01<tab>Die feindlichen Amalj'aa wollen Waffen im heiligen Feuer Ifrits härten. Reise zum Zanr'ak-Altar und besorge von dort <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E88FF030502 /var> aus <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9047030402 /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained the flame-sanctified weapons. Return to the Ring of Ash, and deliver the armaments to Narujj Boh.
target: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_SEQ_02<tab>Du hast <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E88FF030502 /var> erobert! Bring die Waffen zu Narujj Boh im Ring der Asche.

source: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_SEQ_03<tab>You have brought the enchanted weapons to the Ring of Ash. Narujj Boh seems amused at the time and effort his foes have invested, only to have their new toys taken away. Pleased by your deeds, the proud warrior suggests you take your rest until your next task is decided.
target: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_SEQ_03<tab>Narujj Boh hat sich sehr über <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E88FF030502 /var> gefreut, denn der Verlust dieser Waffen wird eure Feinde für eine Weile einschüchtern. Die Ruhepause solltest du nutzen, um dich ein wenig zu erholen.

source: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_TODO_00<tab>Obtain flame-sanctified weapons from heavy arms crates in the vicinity of the Zanr'ak encampment and altar.
TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the flame-sanctified weapons to Narujj Boh.

TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_NARUJIBOH_000_000<tab>Every evening after the sun has sunk below the horizon, there has been frenzied activity at the chief Zanr'ak altar. Our scouts report some manner of ritual involving a growing number of well-crafted weapons.
target: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_NARUJIBOH_000_000<tab>Unsere Erzfeinde, die sich am Zanr'ak-Altar verkriechen, zeigen eine ungewöhnliche Aktivität. Unsere Kundschafter haben dort am Altar ein unheimliches Ritual beobachtet.

source: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_NARUJIBOH_000_002<tab>Considering the single-minded ambitions of our enemies, I assume they are attempting to imbue these armaments with the blessings of their god. We cannot allow such weapons to be brought against us.
target: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_NARUJIBOH_000_002<tab>Wir vermuten, dass dort Waffen in den heiligen Flammen gehärtet werden, um ihnen eine größere Schlagkraft zu verleihen. Das dürfen wir nicht zulassen!

source: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_NARUJIBOH_000_003<tab>Though I would sooner smash their tainted altar into a thousand pieces, I will settle for wresting from them the efforts of their misguided prayers. Honored ally, would you undertake this task, and seize these flame-sanctified weapons from the stores of our twisted kin?
target: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_NARUJIBOH_000_003<tab>Du, <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((der)) /var> du Stärke bewiesen hast, schreite stolzen Hauptes zum Zanr'ak-Altar und nimm dort aus <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9047030402 /var> <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E88FF030502 /var> an dich!

source: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_NARUJIBOH_000_004<tab>Once we have the blessed armaments in our possession, our mystics will unlock the secrets of their power and learn how to dispel the enchantments. This new threat will not long plague us.
target: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_NARUJIBOH_000_004<tab>Damit entwenden wir ihnen nicht nur begehrte Waffen, sondern können auch herausfinden, wie sich die Verzauberung brechen lässt. Damit schlagen wir gleich zwei Lehmfliegen mit einer Klappe!

source: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_NARUJIBOH_000_010<tab>Scour the grounds of the Zanr'ak encampment and altar, and liberate the flame-sanctified weapons from the stores of our vile kin.
target: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_NARUJIBOH_000_010<tab>Ich sage es noch einmal: Besorge <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E88FF030502 /var> aus <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9047030402 /var>! Damit verlieren unsere Feinde gefährliche Waffen und wir können herausfinden, wie die Verzauberung zu brechen ist.

source: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_NARUJIBOH_000_020<tab>Honored ally. I trust you have returned with the armaments of our foes?
target: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_NARUJIBOH_000_020<tab>Willkommen zurück, <var 08 E905 ((Heldin)) ((Held)) /var> Eorzeas! Hast du die Waffen erobert, die in den heiligen Flammen gestählt wurden?

source: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_NARUJIBOH_000_021<tab>Yes, the heat of their searing enchantments is palpable even to a simple warrior such as me. Hah! The lengthy nighttime rituals of the Zahar'ak Amalj'aa come to naught! Rest now, warrior─you have done well.
target: TEXT_BANAMA203_01234_NARUJIBOH_000_021<tab>Ohne Zweifel, das sind <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E88FF030202 /var>! Der Verlust dieser kostbaren Waffen wird unsere Feinde aus Zanr'ak für eine Weile verstummen lassen!
